Line 102: Line 102:
===Mubarak and corruption===
===Mubarak and corruption===
  +
{{main|Debate on the rule of Mubarak}}
A dramatic drop in support for Mubarak occurred with the news that his son [[Alaa Mubarak|Alaa]] was favoured in government tenders and privatization. With both of his sons directly and indirectly owning shares in a large number of companies and minor projects, Mubarak's corruption is leading a series of corruption cases among his cabinet of minor governmental employees.
A dramatic drop in support for Mubarak occurred with the news that his son [[Alaa Mubarak|Alaa]] was favoured in government tenders and privatization. With both of his sons directly and indirectly owning shares in a large number of companies and minor projects, Mubarak's corruption is leading a series of corruption cases among his cabinet of minor governmental employees.
